title: System Dynamics
description: Dynamic modeling and simulation of systems with mechanical, hydraulic, thermal and/or electrical elements.  Frequency response analysis, stability, and feedback control design of dynamic systems. Students cannot receive credit for ME 3017 and AE 3530.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (ME 2202 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 2220 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ME 2016 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
